languages.text: Whenever an enemy moves to a cell adjacent to the wearer, that enemy must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} for 2 rounds. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} if the wearer is not in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Base Armour Property: +10% Dodge and Parry Chance if wearer has no cover 	
When enemy appears in adjacent cell must pass WIL test (without modificator), if enemy fails it gains 1 stack Perplexed for 2 rounds

Whenever an enemy moves to a cell adjacent to the wearer, that enemy must pass a Willpower resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} for 2 rounds. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} if the wearer has no {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}.

Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} if the wearer is not in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}.

Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} if the wearer is not in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}.

languages.text: Cuando un enemigo se mueve a una casilla adyacente al portador, debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de Voluntad o sufrir 1 acumulación de {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g} durante 2 asaltos. Propiedad básica de armadura: +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} si el portador no usa {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy moves to a cell adjacent to the wearer, that enemy must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} for 2 rounds. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} if the wearer is not in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando un enemigo se mueve a una casilla adyacente al portador, debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de Voluntad o sufrir 1 acumulación de {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g} durante 2 asaltos. Propiedad básica de armadura: +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} si el portador no usa {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cobertura{/g}.

languages.text: 敵が使用者に近接するセルに移動するたび、敵は意志力{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に失敗した場合、2ターンの間、+1スタックの{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}を受ける。 基本アーマー特性：使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽物{/g}の中にいる場合、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}および{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}+10%。
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy moves to a cell adjacent to the wearer, that enemy must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} for 2 rounds. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} if the wearer is not in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 敵が使用者に近接するセルに移動するたび、敵は意志力{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しなければ、2ターンの間、+1スタックの{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}を受ける。 基本アーマー特性：使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}カバー{/g}の中にいる場合、 {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}および{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g} +10%。

languages.text: 每当敌人移动到装备者周围的格子时，该名敌人都需要进行意志{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。若未能通过检定，则会获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}效果，持续两轮。 基础护甲特性：当装备者不在{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}后面时，{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}提高10%。
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy moves to a cell adjacent to the wearer, that enemy must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} for 2 rounds. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} if the wearer is not in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当敌人移动到装备者周围的格子时，该名敌人都需要进行意志{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。若未能通过检定，则会获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}效果，持续两轮。 基础护甲特性：当装备者不在{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}后面时，{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}提高10%。

languages.text: Chaque fois qu'un ennemi se déplace sur une case adjacente au porteur, il doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de Force mentale. En cas d'échec, il subit +1 cumul de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g} pendant 2 rounds. Propriété d'armure de base: +10 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} si le porteur n'est pas {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}à couvert{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy moves to a cell adjacent to the wearer, that enemy must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} for 2 rounds. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} if the wearer is not in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois qu'un ennemi se déplace sur une case adjacente au porteur, il doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de Force mentale. En cas d'échec, il subit +1 cumul de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g} pendant 2 rounds. Propriété d'armure de base : +10 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} si le porteur n'est pas {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}à couvert{/g}.

languages.text: Betritt ein Gegner eine an die Zelle des Trägers angrenzende Zelle, wird der Gegner im Falle einer misslungenen Willenskraft-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} 2 Runden lang mit +1 Stapel {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}überrascht{/g} belegt. Rüstung-Grundeigenschaft: +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g}, wenn der Träger nicht in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} ist.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy moves to a cell adjacent to the wearer, that enemy must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} for 2 rounds. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} if the wearer is not in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Betritt ein Gegner eine an die Zelle des Trägers angrenzende Zelle, wird der Gegner im Falle einer misslungenen Willenskraft-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} 2 Runden lang mit +1 Stapel {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}überrascht{/g} belegt. Rüstung-Grundeigenschaft: +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g}, wenn der Träger nicht in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} ist.

languages.text: Перемещаясь на соседнюю клетку с персонажем, противник совершает проверку Воли на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала получает +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательства{/g} на 2 раунда. Базовое свойство: +10% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g}, если персонаж не защищен {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытием{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy moves to a cell adjacent to the wearer, that enemy must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} for 2 rounds. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} if the wearer is not in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Перемещаясь на соседнюю клетку с персонажем, противник совершает проверку Воли на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала получает +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательства{/g} на 2 раунда. Базовое свойство: +10% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g}, если персонаж не защищен {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытием{/g}.

Перемещаясь на соседнюю клетку с персонажем, противник совершает проверку Воли на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала получает +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательства{/g} на 2 раунда. Базовое свойство: +10% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g}, если персонаж не защищен {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытием{/g}.

languages.text: Bir düşman, giyen kişinin bitişiğindeki bir hücreye hareket ettiğinde İrade {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde 2 rauntluğuna +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}şaşkınlık{/g} birikimine maruz kalır. Taban zırh özelliği: Giyen kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}siperde{/g} değilse +%10 {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy moves to a cell adjacent to the wearer, that enemy must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} or suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g} for 2 rounds. Base armour property: +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} if the wearer is not in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}.
